newsitem.title: CHINA: FORECAST-China H1 industrial output 11.8 pct yr/yr.
newsitem.headline: FORECAST-China H1 industrial output 11.8 pct yr/yr.

text.p: China's industrial output is forecast to rise by about 11.8 percent year-on-year in the first half of 1997 to 998.7 billion yuan, the Securities Daily reported on Saturday.
In June alone, industrial output is forecast to rise about 12 percent from the same month last year to 190.2 billion yuan, the newspaper said, quoting the State Information Centre.
China's industrial output grew by 11.9 percent on the year in May to 178.0 billion yuan, the State Statistical Bureau has said.

The State Information Centre, which operates under the State Economic and Trade Commission, said industrial output had picked up in the second quarter compared with the first three months due to an improved economic environment.
